text: @realDonaldTrump @realDonaldTrump and republicans relentlessly investigated Hillary on the deaths of 4 Americans in Benghazi and he emails. Coronavirus 1.5 million and 94,000 deaths warrants an investigation/hearing. We deserve the truth so nothing like this  happens again.
